subject: Hello dear,
body:
Hello dear,
Did you get my last email about a profitable idea of $ 9 Million USD?
We will share 50% each, please reply if you are interested to know more details.
Thanks,
Peggy Chan.

subject: Re: Hello dear,
body:
Hello Peggy,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm intrigued by your proposal and would love to hear more about this profitable idea. Could you please provide more details?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
James
